transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha good evening sir. 
Customer: Ha good evening.
Executive: Main Kartik bol raha tha sir India Mart se. 
Customer: Ha boliye. 
Executive: Aapka jo sir service jo hamari baat hui thi na aapka service ka service approve ho gaya hai wo band kar rahe hain hum log theek hai. 
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aur dusra cheez hai ki uska jo bhi amount banega na wo kal tak hame reflect ho jayega. 
Customer: Theek hai na. 
Executive: To wo main aapko bata doon. 
Customer: Wo aap 900 pe phone kariye upar. 
Executive: Kis se?
Customer: 900 Sanjit ji se baat kariye. 
Executive: Achcha sir aapka aap hi ka to yahan pe number update hai na.
Customer: Are ye to office ka number hai ye jo office pe rahega wo hi phone uthata hai. 
Executive: Achcha theek hai sir uthata hai. Sir second wale number pe call kar loon na. 
Customer: Ha.
Executive: 90 se theek hai sir main baat karta hoon. 
Customer: Ha. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked to call on 900 for refund.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about service approval and refund.

- Executive offered to call on the second number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on the second number.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, service, call, subscription
